name: AntiAircraft
description:
❔What is this game?

This is an entry for TriJam #145, created in 2h57m using Crisp-game-lib.
The theme of the jam is "Anti-[you choose]" and I chose "Anti-Aircraft".

💬Synopsis

You are in a tank on the battlefield. Apparently, the higher-ups don't think your life is important, and the tank's turret can't turn and it's slowly slowing down! Shoot down the enemies to increase your speed and extend your life by as much as one second!

📚🎮Rules&Controls
  • Hold to charge energy, release to shoot.
  • By shooting down the planes, your tank will accelerate.
  • While holding, the tank will stop and lose speed faster than normal.
  • When your speed reaches zero, you will die.
🔍Credits
  • Game engine: Crisp-game-lib
  • Sound: Automatic generation by Crisp-game-lib
  • Translate this document: DeepL
  • Other tools: VSCode
